targetLine.text: Are you talking about like something with one big eye, tentacles, and a snappy thing?

contextBefore.text: These crabs are locals and I get the feeling they're shushing us for a reason. You might wake up something dangerous.

contextAfter.text: Well, that's very specific, but something like that, yes. You just in general don't want to...Oh my goodness. Okay. There's a mistake. We're backing away. Let us live and we will...We'll worship you. We'll build a...Do you like a monument? Oh! Ooh! Whoa! Swim for your life! Nemo!
